roleset.name: coat with candy shell of sugar
roleset.note: SUGARCOAT-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from sugarcoat.01-v)

role.descr: sugar itself, coating usually unspecified or metaphorical

example.name: Typical metaphorical usage
example.text: No matter how-1 the "elite" sugarcoated it *T*-1, the fact was still a fact.
